org.jcvlib.gui

Class Window

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvlib.gui.Window

  • public final class Window
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for all GUI functions.

    Example of usage: 

     // Image image = ...
 Window window = new Window("My Image");
 window.show(image);
 ...
 // window.close();   // Needed if you want close window from your program.
    or just: 
     // Image image = ...
 Window.openAndShow(image, "My Image");

    Author:
    Dmitriy Zavodnikov (d.zavodnikov@gmail.com)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Window()
      Create new window with defined size.
      Window(java.lang.String title)
      Create new window with defined size and given name of this window.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Close current window if it was opened.
      static void closeAll()
      Close all opened windows.
      static int getLastPressedKeyChar()
      Return last key char of last pressed key in some opened window in current application.
      Point getMousePoint()
      Return mouse point on image.
      int getPressedKeyChar()
      Return last key char of pressed in current window.
      static void openAndShow(Image image)
      Simplest way show image.
      static void openAndShow(Image image, java.lang.String title)
      Simplest way show image.
      void show(Image image)
      Show or update image in current window.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Window

        public Window()
        Create new window with defined size. As name of image will be used hash code of given image.

      • Window

        public Window(java.lang.String title)
        Create new window with defined size and given name of this window.

    • Method Detail

      • openAndShow

        public static void openAndShow(Image image)
        Simplest way show image. As name of image will be used hash code of given image.

      • openAndShow

        public static void openAndShow(Image image,
               java.lang.String title)
        Simplest way show image.

      • show

        public void show(Image image)
        Show or update image in current window.

      • close

        public void close()
        Close current window if it was opened. Same as click on close window button.

      • closeAll

        public static void closeAll()
        Close all opened windows. Same as press Esc key.

      • getPressedKeyChar

        public int getPressedKeyChar()
        Return last key char of pressed in current window.

      • getMousePoint

        public Point getMousePoint()
        Return mouse point on image.

      • getLastPressedKeyChar

        public static int getLastPressedKeyChar()
        Return last key char of last pressed key in some opened window in current application.

        If opened only one window result will be same as getPressedKeyChar().
